snippet: The suspect was the bookkeeper for a group that hijacked the German tanker the Marida Marguerite and its crew  three years ago, the authorities said.
abstract: German authorities say that they have arrested man, identified only by initial 'M', who was bookkeeper for band of Somali pirates who hijacked German oil tanker Marida Marguerite and its crew in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The suspect was the bookkeeper for a group that hijacked the German tanker the Marida Marguerite and its crew  three years ago, the authorities said.

headline.seo: Germany Accuses Refugee of Being Somali Pirates’ Accountant
headline.main: Germany Accuses Man of Being Somali Pirates’ Accountant
headline.print_headline: A Suspect In Tallying Pirate Spoils
